test_summary: Claude Code Task Tool Behavior Analysis

basic_subprocess.description: Test if Task Tool can create basic subprocess
basic_subprocess.expected_behavior: Should create subprocess and return results
basic_subprocess.actual_behavior: Task Tool not available in test environment

context_passing.description: Test context inheritance in Task Tool subprocesses
context_passing.expected_behavior: Context should be filtered and passed to subprocess

agent_engineer.description: Test Engineer agent short name behavior
agent_engineer.actual_behavior: Agent short names may just be labels

agent_documenter.description: Test Documenter agent short name behavior
agent_documenter.actual_behavior: Agent short names may just be labels

agent_qa.description: Test QA agent short name behavior
agent_qa.actual_behavior: Agent short names may just be labels

agent_security.description: Test Security agent short name behavior
agent_security.actual_behavior: Agent short names may just be labels

agent_ops.description: Test Ops agent short name behavior
agent_ops.actual_behavior: Agent short names may just be labels

subprocess_isolation.description: Test if subprocesses are isolated and can return values
subprocess_isolation.expected_behavior: Subprocesses should be isolated with return value mechanism

multi_agent_orchestration.expected: PM delegates to specialized agents via Task Tool
multi_agent_orchestration.reality: Task Tool creates basic subprocesses without agent specialization

context_filtering.expected: Rich context filtering based on agent domain

agent_capabilities.reality: Agent names may just be labels without behavioral differences

agent_specialization.gap: Agent names don't provide specialized behavior
agent_specialization.bridge: Memory-based agent profiles could add specialization

context_enhancement.bridge: Agent profiles could define context preferences

return_value_structure.bridge: Standardized return formats in agent profiles
